response:
Urgent neuroimaging is crucial to confirm the anatomical localisation and exclude compressive lesions. Comprehensive serological and CSF analysis is required to differentiate between MS, NMOSD, and MOGAD, as this dictates long-term management.

investigations = ["MRI of Brain and Whole Spine with contrast", "Serum Aquaporin-4 antibodies", "Serum MOG antibodies", "Lumbar Puncture for CSF analysis (Oligoclonal bands, cell count, protein, glucose)", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Liver function tests", "C-reactive protein", "Erythrocyte sedimentation rate", "Antinuclear antibodies", "dsDNA antibodies", "Vitamin B12", "Folate", "HIV serology", "Syphilis serology", "Visual Evoked Potentials", "Optical Coherence Tomography"]
